responses: Our fee structure includes a tuition fee of ₹1,50,000 per annum. Additional costs include a one-time admission fee of ₹10,000 and other administrative fees totaling approximately ₹15,000. We offer scholarships based on merit and financial need. For detailed information on payment options and financial aid, please contact our finance department.

These events are the heartbeat of our campus, bringing students together to celebrate, compete, and grow. Let me know if you'd like more details about any specific event! 😊

Our University has Excellent Infrastructure. Campus is clean. Good IT Labs With Good Speed of Internet connection.
College infrastructure encompasses classrooms, libraries, laboratories, and recreational facilities, all of which are essential for providing a conducive learning environment.
Our college infrastructure is top-notch, including specialized labs for networking, electronics, and mechanical engineering, ensuring students have access to the latest technology and resources.
With excellent infrastructure, the college offers a range of facilities, including dedicated labs for robotics, programming, and civil engineering, fostering an innovative learning environment.

The college's infrastructure is exceptional, with cutting-edge facilities that include a simulation lab for real-world problem-solving, a dedicated innovation hub for startups, and collaborative spaces that encourage teamwork among students from different disciplines.

These are the scholarships available in our university: Central Sector Scholarship, A scholarship for college and university students from the Ministry of Human Resource Development. It is for students from the General, SC, ST communities and physically handicapped students. Chancellor Merit Cum Means Scholarship. A scholarship that awards freeship and merit-cum-means scholarship for the subsequent years. The percentage of scholarship amount remains constant throughout the course duration. Suvarna Jubilee Merit Scholarship. A scholarship for economically disadvantaged but academically outstanding students in Kerala. CH Muhammed Koya Scholarship. A scholarship for first year degree, PG students, and students admitted to self financing professional colleges under merit quota.

patterns: what are the festivals at the college
what are the fests at the college
what are the events at college
responses: Hello! 😊 Let me tell you about our grand annual tech-fest, KARMA – a three-day extravaganza filled with excitement and innovation!  📅 Day 1:  - The festival kicks off with games, hackathons, and other engaging activities.  - The official inauguration ceremony is conducted by a famous personality.  - Following the inauguration, students light up the stage with vibrant dances, soulful songs, and other performances.  📅 Day 2:  - A day packed with student performances, including stunning fashion shows.  - The evening is made magical with musical performances by renowned artists.  📅 Day 3:  - The final day begins with a spectacular autoshow, showcasing a variety of cars and bikes.  - The festival concludes with a thrilling techno party at night, featuring an electrifying performance by a renowned DJ.  KARMA is not just a tech-fest; it's an unforgettable celebration of talent, innovation, and fun. Let me know if you'd like more details or assistance regarding the event! 😊.

The local area has many attractions including popular restaurants, shopping areas, and cultural sites. Public transportation options are available, and local events offer additional opportunities for exploration and engagement. For more information, consult our local area guide.
